sentences.english: He is a stout man, red of face.
sentences.chinese: 他是臉色紅潤，非常強壯。

sentences.english: With nothing livid, still her lips were red.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一絲青與紫，她依然擁有紅潤嘴脣。

sentences.english: The little girl has a rosy face.
His face becomes ruby under the lamp light.
sentences.chinese: 燈光下他的臉色紅潤起來。

sentences.english: Ruddiness can tell you about the blood circulation, whether it's poor or good.
sentences.chinese: 紅潤的程度說明血液循環情況的好壞。

sentences.english: You turn bright red after drinking two tablespoons of beer.
sentences.chinese: 你在猛灌兩大勺啤酒後面色變的紅潤光鮮。

sentences.english: I hate a florid complexion and dark eyes in a man.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭男人長着紅潤的皮膚，黑眼珠。

sentences.english: That hunter has a ruddy face because he is outdoors so much.
sentences.chinese: 那個獵人臉色紅潤，因爲他長期待在戶外。

sentences.english: The face was strong, big-boned and ruddy .
sentences.chinese: 臉是結實紅潤的，顴骨高高的。

sentences.english: A large urbane and florid and smooth - faced man walked out.
sentences.chinese: 一個身材高大，態度和藹，臉色紅潤的人走了出來。

sentences.english: For a pretty flush that lasts, use two shades of blush.
sentences.chinese: 想要面色持久紅潤，可以用兩種不同深淺的腮紅。

sentences.english: Sweet rose, whose hue angry and brave .
sentences.chinese: 美麗的玫瑰，色澤紅潤鮮麗。

sentences.english: They wore shrouds and were often described as bloated and of ruddy or dark countenance.
sentences.chinese: 他們穿壽衣，但往往被臃腫和紅潤或暗的臉上描述。

sentences.english: Her grandfather is a jovial, ruddy-faced old gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 她的教父是一位臉色紅潤的幽默老紳士。

sentences.english: The person of intentional dirty disease also often complexion is ruddy.
sentences.chinese: 有心臟疾病的人也往往臉色紅潤。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
